message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be of great value to you. Given its unique benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,250?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
